page.title: 15SOME YALDING EVENTS
page.content: Every June, close to St Peter's Day, there is held in Yalding the Village Fair. Many local organisations take part in this event which raises money for local charitable purposes. Some Â£1500 is raised each year and beneficiaries have included the school (for purchase of a computer), Village Hall, Cleaves Hall, Yalding Church, and The Weald Playgroup. In December the Christingle Service in church, organised by the School, is becoming an annual custom with an attendance of over 200 people. Buston Manor, Hunton, sees foxhunting each year. In December 1982 Mrs Perrins celebrated her 100th birthday, the youngest schoolchild helping her plant a tree on The Green. On her birthday schoolchildren sang to her, played recorders and read a specially written poem.
